channel.title: Need help with cmd
channel.description: look heres what i have @echo off title Run Hero "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_25" -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause thats the correct jdk i have but heres the error i get http://gyazo.com/fe695b96f9634bfad4e0c3e2d649a4e6

item.title: Need help with cmd
item.dc:creator: @Devinhdl Devinhdl
item.description:
@Devinhdl wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:16, topic:426685”][quote author=ravekitty link=topic=529383.msg3863093#msg3863093 date=1324773143]
“could not find or load main class server” is the error i get when i click run.bat.
[/quote]

Post the contents of the .Batch file you’re trying to run. I can fix this in 10 seconds flat.[/quote]
I’m gonna time you

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with cmd

item.description:

ravekitty:

“could not find or load main class server” is the error i get when i click run.bat.

Post the contents of the .Batch file you’re trying to run. I can fix this in 10 seconds flat.

item.title: Need help with cmd
item.dc:creator: @Devinhdl Devinhdl
item.description:
@Devinhdl wrote:

Uninstall, and re-install java, but download the latest jdk and jre… I had this problem with a player on my server and I had him do that^, and it worked.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with cmd

item.description:
@Devinhdl wrote:

Do you have your environmental variables set correctly?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with cmd
item.dc:creator: @jordan_dymond jordan_dymond
item.description:
@jordan_dymond wrote:

@echo off
title Run Hero
:run
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\bin\java” -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
goto run

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with cmd
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“ultimatepkvillage, post:5, topic:426685”]@echo off title Run Hero Start Java -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause

@echo off title Run Hero start javac -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause[/quote]

A.K.A. exactly what I just said. The “start” isn’t needed.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with cmd
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

@echo off title Run Hero Start Java -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause

@echo off title Run Hero Start javac -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause

@echo off title Run Hero Start JavaW -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause

item.title: Need help with cmd
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

mikeandike:

can i ask what you mean by that?

Lol? I don’t know how I can be any clearer except by spoonfeeding you the code, so here you go:

Java -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
pause
Javac -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
pause
Javaw -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
pause

Try those.

Read full topic

Javac
Javaw
